title: Is PESSAT exam officially cancelled from next year???
content: If pessat exam is cancelled will they start taking students through comedk???

comments.body: They mentioned during counselling that 40% will be kcet, 10%mq and rest through JEE Mains.
Yepp only jee mains and kcet now
will jee mains fee be the same as pessat?
Yessir, jee and kcet ftw now
